reviews.review:
I mean, it's csgo... where can you go wrong?
CYKA BLYAT *speaks russian* and then team kills you.
świetna gra do nauki języka rosyjskiego.
fun game but doesn't have much re-play ability.

Games is great, but problem is cheaters I have played about 100 competition games, and at least 16 of the games have gotten someone vac ban and I'm pretty sure that there's even more cheaters that haven't gotten banned yet.

I don't like counterstrike not my type of game but I don't just give a game a bad score just cause I don't like it I give a score based on if the game is functioning and excels in experience.

Counter strike is a great game you shoot guns and there is skill involved more skill than I'm good enough to wield so this game gets a 10/10 cause its a game to learn to master. Plus its been around for years, and still has a broad audience from both pro league and just casual. 

10/10 great game
